wall Wall WallSkillIcon wallBuild.swf Defensive - Absorbs damage dealt to the Commander and subtracts from own health ArmoredSound
evade Evade EvadeSkillIcon evade.swf Defensive - 50% chance to negate the effects of an enemy Activation skill on this WeirdSound
payback Payback PaybackSkillIcon payback.swf Defensive - When enemy uses an Activation skill on this (Other than Mimic), 50% chance to use same skill on the original enemy unit WeirdSound
flying Flying FlyingSkillIcon flyingbonus.swf Defensive - 50% chance to dodge attacks by non-Flying units FlyingSound
armored Armored ArmoredSkillIcon shieldDefend.swf Defensive - Reduces damage taken by attacks ArmoredSound
counter Counter CounterSkillIcon spikeCounterAttack.swf Defensive - When damaged by an attack, deal damage back to attacker LeechSound
regenerate Regenerate RegenerationSkillIcon regenerate.swf Defensive - When card health reaches zero, 50% chance of gaining back health RegenSound
heal Heal HealSkillIcon increasehealth.swf Activation - Increases health of a random allied Assault card BoostSound
rally Rally RallySkillIcon increaseattack.swf Activation - Increases the Attack of a random allied Assault card BoostSound
enfeeble Enfeeble EnfeebleSkillIcon enfeeble.swf Activation - Increases any damage directed at a random enemy Assault card WeirdSound
strike Strike MissileSkillIcon missileexplosion.swf Activation - Deals damage to a random enemy Assault card StrikeSound
jam Jam JammingSkillIcon jacobsLadder.swf electric.swf Activation - 50% chance of preventing a random enemy Assault card from attacking or using Activation skills next turn. JamSound
weaken Weaken WeakenSkillIcon weaken.swf Activation - Reduce the attack of a random enemy Assault card WeakenSound
siege Siege SiegeSkillIcon wallDestroy.swf Activation - Deals damage to a random enemy Structure SiegeSound
mimic Mimic MimicSkillIcon mimic.swf mimic.swf Activation - Uses any "Activation" skills of an enemy Assault card, except Mimic. Ignores Faction modifiers (ex. "Strike Raider 1" becomes "Strike 1") MimicSound
flurry Flurry FlurrySkillIcon flurrycharge.swf Combat-Modifier - 50% chance to Attack extra times a turn WeirdSound
swipe Swipe SwipeSkillIcon swipe.swf Combat-Modifier - When attacking an Assault unit this also attacks the adjacent enemy Assault units, if any WeirdSound
fear Fear FearSkillIcon fear.swf Combat-Modifier - Attack Commander directly FearSound
antiair AntiAir AntiairSkillIcon Combat-Modifier - Always hits flying units and deals extra damage to them StrikeSound
valor Valor ValorSkillIcon valor.swf Combat-Modifier - When enemy has more Assault units than you, deal additional attack damage WeirdSound
pierce Pierce AttackSkillIcon Combat-Modifier - Reduces the effect of enemy skills that prevent Attack Damage shieldDestroy_doorsFade.swf SiegeSound
pierce_p Pierce AttackSkillIcon Combat-Modifier - Reduces the effect of enemy skills that prevent Attack Damage protectpierced.swf SiegeSound
immobilize Immobilize ImmobilizeIcon immobilize.swf immobilizeContinued.swf Damage-Dependant - After damaging an enemy from an attack, 50% chance of preventing damaged Assault card from attacking ImmobilizeSound
poison Poison PoisonSkillIcon poison.swf poisonContinued.swf Damage-Dependant - Assault cards that took attack damage from this unit take damage at the beginning of the poisoned unit's turn PoisonSound
crush Crush CrushSkillIcon crush.swf Damage-Dependant - Damages the enemy Commander when the card destroys an enemy Assault card by attack damage
leech Leech LeechSkillIcon leechingbonus.swf Damage-Dependant - Heals this card as it deals attack damage to an Assault card LeechSound
siphon Siphon SiphonSkillIcon leechingbonus.swf Damage-Dependant - Heals the Commander as this card deals attack damage to an Assault card LeechSound
rush Rush RushSkillIcon rush.swf Decrease the cost of a random owner's Assault card WooshSound
augment Augment ShockSkillIcon electricution.swf Increase the strength of a unit's abilities (example using Augment 1: Strike 1 = Strike 2) WeirdSound
blitz Blitz electricution.swf When played, take an action if opposing unit has 0 wait time WeirdSound
repair Repair RepairSkillIcon repair.swf Activation - Replenish a Structure's lost health. -80 -110
split Split SplitSkillIcon split.swf Activation - Make a copy of this (Cannot be Mimiced!)
backfire Backfire BackfireSkillIcon backfire.swf Destroyed - When this is destroyed, deal damage to own Commander
shock Shock ShockSkillIcon shock.swf Activation - Deal damage directly to the Enemy Commander (Damage does not redirect to Walls)
recharge Recharge RechargeSkillIcon Activation - 50% chance that this card will return to the bottom of the deck after use
infuse Infuse InfuseSkillIcon infuse.swf Activation - Change the type of any Assault unit (allied or enemy) Also changes any helpful skill (Heal, Rally, etc.) that only affects a certain type to affect the specified type. (Infuse status cannot be Cleansed)
fusion Fusion FusionSkillIcon fusionloop.swf Static - When 3 or more cards with Fusion are active, double the effects of this card's skills.
prefusion fusionbuildup.swf
mist Mist FogSkillIcon fogreveal.swf fogloop.swf Static - Allied Assault and Structure cards are hidden until active or destroyed
protect Protect ProtectSkillIcon protect.swf Activation - Prevents damage from attack or any skill
berserk Berserk BerserkSkillIcon berserk.swf Damage-Dependant - When this unit deals attack damage, permanently raise Attack
supply Supply SupplySkillIcon supply.swf Activation - Heal this unit and adjacent Assault units (Can only be Mimiced by Assault units)
tribute Tribute TributeSkillIcon tribute.swf Defensive - When another allied assault card, uses an Activation Skill on this (besides skills affected by Chaos), 50% chance to use that ability on the original unit.
chaos Chaos SkillIconChaos chaos.swf chaosloop.swf Activation - If an enemy Assault unit were to use an Activation skill that would target one of its enemies, it targets an ally or itself instead. (The skills used by a Chaosed unit cannot be Evaded)
refresh Refresh SkillIconRefresh refresh.swf Defensive - At the end of this unit's turn, restore all health to full.
cleanse Cleanse SkillIconReplenish replenish.swf Activation - Remove all negative status effects from an ally Assault unit (Poison, Disease, Jam, Immobilize, Enfeeble, Chaos, Freeze).
disease Disease SkillIconDisease disease.swf diseaseloop.swf Damage-Dependant - After damaging an enemy from an attack, damaged Assault unit can no longer regain lost health.
freeze Freeze FreezeSkillIcon freeze.swf freezeloop.swf Activation - Prevents enemy assault unit from taking an action or decreasing its timer.
blizzard Blizzard BlizzardSkillIcon blizzardreveal.swf blizzardloop.swf Static - Allied Assault and Structure cards are hidden until active or destroyed
intercept Intercept InterceptSkillIcon interceptorigin.swf intercept.swf Defensive - If an adjacent Assault unit were to be the target of an Enemy skill while this unit is not the target of the same skill, target this unit instead if this unit is a valid target. (Only 1 Intercept per skill. If two possible Intercepts, oldest unit has priority.)
burst Burst CritSkillIcon crit.swf Combat-Modifier - When this unit attacks, if the defending Assault unit's health is at max, this unit deals additional attack damage.
summon Summon SummonSkillIcon summon.swf Activation - Plays a copy of the specified card.
